title: Bug 48729JNDIRealm.java not parsing roles correctly
description: Created attachment 24972 [details]small patch for JNDIRealm.javaAccording to the docs:http://tomcat.apache.org/tomcat6.0doc/realmhowto.htmlit says roles can be specified by both userRoleName, AND roleNamemechanisms.But, if both are used then the result is that userRoleName roles areexcluded.I believe the correct approach is in the attached patch.
